company_legal_names: tosepan kali sc de rl de cv.
long_description: tosepan kali , which in our nahuatl language means "our house", is a cooperative of alternative tourism, created under the cooperative movement of the tosepan titataniske cooperative society, an organization comprised of indigenous peasant families from the northeastern sierra of puebla, working together to improve our quality of life. we invite you to share with us a different way of doing tourism. we are a social enterprise formed by indigenous nahuatl men and women; we provide a distinguished, high quality, tourist service, respecting nature and promoting the values of nahuatl culture and cooperatives. being a network of alternative tourism in the northeastern sierra region of puebla, promoting social development, and generating solidarity economy processes through conscious tourism. tosepan kali has several facilities that allow us to offer a wide range of services to suit the taste of all visitors.at our venue, you can stay in comfortable cabins, rooms and hostel designed with bamboo.
generated_description: tosepan kali, legally known as tosepan kali sc de rl de cv, is a social enterprise based in cuetzalan, puebla. it operates as a cooperative of alternative tourism, comprising indigenous nahuatl men and women. the company is dedicated to providing high-quality tourist services while respecting nature and promoting nahuatl culture and cooperative values. tosepan kali offers a variety of accommodations, including cabins, rooms, and hostels, designed with eco-friendly materials and featuring sustainable practices such as rainwater harvesting, wastewater treatment, and solar energy capture. the company also includes a spa offering treatments based on traditional nahuatl knowledge and natural products. additionally, tosepan kali operates a network of rural tourism stations and units, allowing visitors to explore the region's natural attractions and cultural heritage.
